name: security-controls-mcp
description: Query and map security framework controls via the Secure Controls Framework (SCF). Map between ISO 27001, NIST CSF, DORA, PCI DSS, SOC 2, and 100+ frameworks.
long_description:
The Security Controls MCP Server provides searchable access to the Secure Controls Framework (SCF) â€” a comprehensive meta-framework that maps security controls across 100+ industry standards and regulations.

**Key capabilities:**
- Search 1,000+ SCF controls by keyword
- Map controls between any two frameworks (e.g., ISO 27001 to NIST CSF)
- List all available security frameworks with metadata
- Get detailed control information including descriptions and framework mappings
- Import and query purchased standards (ISO 27001, NIST 800-53, etc.)

**Frameworks include:** ISO 27001, ISO 27002, NIST CSF, NIST 800-53, PCI DSS, SOC 2, DORA, GDPR, HIPAA, CIS Controls, COBIT, and many more.
